paragraph: Robert Knudson (September 29, 1925 â€“ January 21, 2006) was an American sound engineer. He won three Academy Awards for Best Sound and was nominated for seven more in the same category. He worked on more than 100 films between 1963 and 1995.
Knudson won three Academy Awards and was nominated for seven more:
E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial (1982)NominatedA Star Is Born (1976)
Close Encounters of the Third Kind (1977)
